div.p: SCHREBERA, in botany: A genus of the digynia order, belonging to the pentandria claſs of plant; and in the natural method ranking with thoſe of which the order is doubtful. The calyx is quinquepartite; the corolla funnel-ſhaped, with the filaments in the throat, and having each a ſcale at the baſe.
